attributes.action: Make the Conservative party repay the estimate £2.4tn loss in value the UK faced
attributes.background: In ONS estimated everything in the UK is worth £8.1tn by the start of 2015, since the brexit vote, the value of the pound is down 30% against the USD. Britain will likely not recover from this for many years. The Conservative party should pay damages to the general public for its wrong doings.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions that call on the Government or Parliament to take action.
